Name: Slow
Effect: The time between a character's actions is increased.

Name: Stop
Effect: The character's ATB gauge freezes, and they cannot act.

Name: Sleep
Effect: The character falls asleep and cannot act until they are attacked or it wears off.

Name: Blind
Effect: The character's physical attacks are less likely to hit.

Name: Lock
Effect: The character cannot use their Techs.

Name: Chaos
Effect: The character attacks allies and enemies at random.

Name: Haste
Effect: The character's ATB gauge fills faster, so they can act more often.

Name: Protect
Effect: The character takes less damage from physical attacks.

Name: Barrier
Effect: The character takes less damage from magical attacks.
